landing.title: Hi there! My name is Mathías Falcón and I am a Full Stack Dev.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I am 19 years old, I live in Montevideo, Uruguay and I am a Systems Engineering student. I am a high school graduate with engineering orientation which focuses on physics and mathematics. I currently work as a Full Stack Web Developer in a Freelance way, looking for a permanent job opportunity.

experience1.title: Full Stack Developer - Freelancer
experience1.description: I work as a Web Full Stack Developer, in a freelancer way while I look for a permanent job offer.

experience2.title: Professional DJ - Freelancer
experience2.description: I used to work as a professional DJ in my free time, playing at most popular Uruguay's nightclubs and in private events.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project-1-description:
The point of this project consisted on creating an online store of any merchandise we choose.

The project itself it's written in Spanish because not all team members knew how to speak English.
projects.project-2-description: This project consisted in creating a Fintech App using React Native complemented with an microservice architecture API.

contact.title: Feel Free to Contact Me
contact.subtitle: I will get back to you as soon as posible :)
